state_analysis: The terminal is still stuck in the pager interface, displaying help information and not allowing any exit commands to work. This indicates a persistent issue with being unable to interact normally with the terminal.
explanation: Given the continuous issue with the pager, we will take the drastic measure of forcefully terminating the terminal session to regain control. This will allow us to restart the terminal and execute the necessary git commands after the restart. If this does not work, we may have to restart the terminal application itself.
